anathema: Give mercy to any who provoke a fight with you, provoke a fight
edict: Erase all traces of defeated foes, meditate, remain celibate and detached from worldly pleasures, utterly destroy your enemies
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Diomazul (The Serpent of Eighty Blades)](/Deities.aspx?ID=614)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Erase all traces of defeated foes, meditate, remain celibate and detached from worldly pleasures, utterly destroy your enemies

**Anathema** Give mercy to any who provoke a fight with you, provoke a fight

**Area of Concern**
Austerity, retribution, war

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Dexterity

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Scimitar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=393)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Earth](/Domains.aspx?ID=73), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=98), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=1632)

- **2nd**
[Slough Skin](/Spells.aspx?ID=2368)

- **4th**
[Weapon Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=1758)

</column>
name: Diomazul (The Serpent of Eighty Blades)
